text: [Music] [Applause] [Music] hello I'm Jimmy Whit I'm the president of the Alabama fruit and vegetable growers association I'd like to take this opportunity to thank all of our conference exhibitors and sponsors from our 2014 uh conference we had a six educational sessions and over 300 different uh attendees at our conference [Music] I'm Doug Chapman I'm a regional Extension agent with the Alabama Cooperative Extension system uh work on the commercial horiculture team and I'd like to tell you a little bit about the workshops that will be held at the Alabama fruit and vegetable Growers annual conference and trade show in February we'll have a fruit tree grafting Workshop we'll have a vegetable grafting Workshop we'll have a high tunnel Workshop a marketing workshop and a beekeeping workshop and these are all hand Zone workshops uh it's where you uh actually get to do something that you're interested in and we look forward to having you in Auburn and uh we'll try to make you as welcome as we [Music] can I'm a regional Extension agent with uh corporative extension work in commercial Horticulture I'd like to invite you to the 2015 Alabama fruit and vegetable Growers Association conference in Auburn this year and would love for you to come lots of educational sessions uh lots of speakers uh some from out throughout the southeast cover a wide range of topics and it's just part of what you would get from uh coming to this conference uh another thing that you'll benefit from is interacting with other Growers uh and a trade show and also we'll have some some workshops so if you're growing uh if you're a producer now or if you're thinking about uh being a producer I think this would be uh very beneficial to [Music] you I'd like to invite all of our sponsors anyone who wants to become a sponsor or sponsor an event at the uh at the meeting uh invitees you to uh become an exhibitor if you have products or or services that you would like to offer someone in uh in this field uh I also like to invite you to become a member and you can find a lot of this information on our website at AFV ga. aces.edu um we'll also have a uh a form there where you can enroll or or register online for the conference this next year or you can do it uh by paper also uh you can Al also visit us on Facebook uh from more information [Music]
